title: No Support Response Since Saturday
body: I have filed two requests and haven't received a response since Saturday. What gives Riot?

replies.body:
Hey Lucky Day!

I apologize for any confusion in your Ticket submissions!  Your ticket was handled by one of our agents, and was forwarded to our specialists to take a look at it.  Unfortunately, due to a fairly large spike in overall Ticket Volume, we are a few days behind in answering tickets.  Rest assured your ticket was not forgotten about, and is going to be answered as quickly as possible!

I look forward to helping alleviate some confusion!  If you have any further concerns, don't hesitate to let me know!
